attributes.action: Effectivley deal with repeat offending criminals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the public want a safe socity, Criminals can not continely be given short sentences or fines for thier 3rd, 4th or 5th conviction of the same offence. Such people are a menace to the public and should be liable for a longer maximum duration in prision. Such Criminals should also be responsible for paying for all costs associated with thier arrest and conviction once conviction No 3 is reached. Lets start to look after the public not criminals.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
